sentences: Job Title: Full Stack Web Developer
Digital Waffle is working in partnership with a rapidly growing company that operates in the online property comparison market
Their platform is used by thousands of customers daily, helping them to find the best deals on their property purchases and moves
They are looking for a Senior Full Stack Developer to join their team in Cardiff and help take their new platform to the next level
Develop and maintain web applications using a variety of programming languages and frameworks
Work with the development team to define and implement technical solutions that meet the needs of the business
Collaborate with product, design, and marketing teams to understand business requirements and user needs
Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code that meets coding standards and best practices
Test and debug code to ensure high quality and optimal performance
Participate in code reviews and contribute to team knowledge sharing
Work in an agile development environment, following agile principles and practices
Keep up-to-date with the latest web development trends and technologies
Strong experience in a Full Stack Development role, with a strong track record of delivering high-quality web applications
Proven experience in developing and deploying applications using modern front-end frameworks and libraries
Strong experience in back-end development, including API design and development, and database design and management
Regular team outings and social events
Opportunity to work on cutting-edge projects and technologies
If you are interested or would like to find out more then apply now!
